alert.note: Alert for Marathon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Ice Storm Warning issued March 04 at 3:30PM CST until March 05 at 12:00PM CST by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...ICE STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Significant icing expected. Total ice accumulations between one tenth and three tenths of an inch. * WHERE...Marathon County. * WHEN...From Midnight tonight to Noon CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery and ice covered road conditions. Intermittent power outages can be expected.
info.instruction: Travel is strongly discouraged. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
